text: إِن يَثْقَفُوكُمْ يَكُونُوا۟ لَكُمْ أَعْدَآءً وَيَبْسُطُوٓا۟ إِلَيْكُمْ أَيْدِيَهُمْ وَأَلْسِنَتَهُم بِٱلسُّوٓءِ وَوَدُّوا۟ لَوْ تَكْفُرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: If they gain dominance over you, they would be to you as enemies and extend against you their hands and their tongues with evil, and they wish you would disbelieve.
translation.id.indonesian: Jika mereka menangkap kamu, niscaya mereka bertindak sebagai musuh bagimu dan melepaskan tangan dan lidah mereka kepadamu dengan menyakiti(mu); dan mereka ingin supaya kamu (kembali) kafir.
